# Core Rules These rules apply at all times, including between rounds.
- [textlink="1. Admins have final say" link="RuleC1"] - [textlink="2. Don't be a dick" link="RuleC2"] - [textlink="3. No Hate Speech or Discriminatory Language" link="RuleC3"] - [textlink="4. No sexual content/themes, including erotic roleplay (ERP) and no shock content" link="RuleC4"] - [textlink="5. Do not use out of game methods to communicate with other players" link="RuleC5"] - [textlink="6. Do not attempt to evade bans" link="RuleC6"] - [textlink="7. Only use English" link="RuleC7"] - [textlink="8. Do not exploit the game, use cheats, or macros" link="RuleC8"] - [textlink="9. Do not use multiple accounts, or alt accounts, and do not share accounts" link="RuleC9"] - [textlink="10. Do not abuse or ignore admin messages" link="RuleC10"] - [textlink="11.
